Description
===========
  Play3DSound illustrates how to play a wave file with 3D-positioning using
  DirectSound.

Path
====
  Source: Mssdk\Samples\Multimedia\DSound\Src\Play3DSound

  Executable: Mssdk\Samples\Multimedia\DSound\Bin

User's Guide
============
  Load sounds and adjust the playback properties with the dialog controls. The
  3D position of the sound is displayed graphically.

Programming Notes
=================
  This sample was intended to be very simple, showing the basics of playing a
  sound using the 3D features of the DirectSound API.
